EmailTemplate.description: Template to send the case owner a notification when there’s a ‘New Comment’ added to a ‘Case’.
EmailTemplate.name: ZZ_SBU Internal: New Comment (In-Progress)
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} has a new comment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
{!Case.CaseNumber} has a ‘New Comment’ from {!Contact.Name}
Please review the case as necessary
Detail Case Link: {!Case.Link}
Thank You,
SFDC Team
SFDCSupport@carefirst.com
